    ASELLINA
Sundeck

sundeck

The Sundeck is located at the top of Royalton Park Avenue's tri-level rooftop and can hold up to 180 people with flexible seating. Great for soaking up some Vitamin D during the day and sipping a cool cocktail during the evening hours. The Sundeck serves up traditional and frozen drinks, like our classic Frosé cocktail, fresh coconuts from CoCo & Co, an extended beer menu, as well as delicious café bites.

FROSÉ FRIDAY
Open during the summer season

SUNDECK HOURS:
Open during the summer season
